original: apply Build_UnitalSeparationAlgebra. intros n. unfold unital_is_residual. destruct (incr_unital_iff_residual n). split. - destruct (H n) as [m [residue_inc]]. exists m. apply residue_inc. - intros m [residue_m increasing_m]. split. + unfold residue_exists. exists m. apply residue_m. + apply all_increasing.
